title: Brent Barletto, 35, Springfield
maintext:
Brent Matthew Barletto, 35, Springfield, passed into the loving arms of the lord on April 18, 2018.
He was born May 26, 1982, in Sheboygan, the son of Douglas and Linda Barletto (husband, Gary Scofield). Brent loved to fish, hike, snowboard, ski and snowmobile. He was always a happy, caring person and loved by many people.
He was preceded in death by his Barletto grandparents; uncles, Timothy and Joseph Barletto.
Survivors include his father, Douglas; mother and stepfather, Linda and Gary Scofield; his beloved daughter, Lillyann Barletto; sister, Audra (Monty) Stauffer; nephews, Marek and Alden Stauffer; maternal grandparents, Irv (Lois) Koch; stepbrother, Chris Scofield; stepsister, Monique Scofield; many loved aunts, uncles, cousins and friends.
Visitation will be held Monday, April 30, from 4 to 5 p.m. at Grace Evangelical Lutheran Church, 113 County Park Road, Waupun.
A memorial service will be held at 5 p.m., Monday, April 30, at Grace Evangelical Lutheran Church with the Rev. David Cooper officiating. Burial will follow at Highland Memory Gardens.
Kohls Community Funeral Home is assisting the family. Visit kohlsfh.com.
